description: Square array T(m,n), read by ascending antidiagonals. Let f(k) = k/2 if k is even, otherwise ((2*n+1)*k+2*r+1)/2, r is the smallest integer greater than -1, where m = f^j(m) for j > 0 exists and is determined in A345228, T(m,n) is the smallest number reached in the cyclic trajectory of m = f^j(m). f^j(m) means j times recursion into f(m).
